```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(tsibble)
library(readr)
```

## R Markdown

```{r gonio}
gonio <- read_csv("gonio_gpx_merge_2019.csv")
```

```{r data}
new_gonio <- gonio %>%
  distinct()
new_gonio
```

```{r}
gonio_tsbl <- as_tsibble(new_gonio, key=hex, time=date)
```

```{r}
gonio_tsbl %>%
  group_by_key() %>%
  index_by(date = ~ as_date(.)) %>% 
  summarise(max_strength_db = max(strength_db))
```
